description: Complete system overview documenting the four main components (spreadsheet management, storage/barcode system, sequencing jobs, and sample submission) and their interactions
Detailed documentation of PostgreSQL database schema, including tables for spreadsheet metadata, storage/inventory tracking, sample data, and sequencing jobs with their relationships and constraints
Technical documentation of algorithms used for parsing different spreadsheet formats, data extraction rules, and transformation logic for loading into the relational database
Comprehensive documentation of data flow between the four main components, including sequence diagrams for key operations like sample submission and job creation
Detailed documentation of barcode generation algorithms, storage location tracking logic, and inventory management state transitions
